mapper.select: select u.id, username, password, salt, email, activation_code, forgotten_password_code, forgotten_password_time, remember_code, created_on, last_login, active, first_name, last_name, company, phone, customer_id, ip_address,ug.group_id from sim_users u left join sim_users_groups ug on ug.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select u.*,desArray.description from sim_users u left join (select gd.user_id,group_concat(gd.description) description from (select ug.user_id,g.description from sim_users_groups ug, sim_groups g where ug.group_id = g.id) gd GROUP BY gd.user_id) desArray on u.id = user_id where description != 'Customers Group'
